meanings.sent1: The oxygenous atmosphere was perfect for the divers.
meanings.sent2: Plants need oxygenous air to survive.
meanings.sent3: The oxygenous clouds seemed to be playing hide and seek with the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as refreshing as an oxygenous breeze.
meanings.sent5: The oxygenous scent of the forest filled his lungs with energy.

meanings.sent1: The oxygenous solution bubbled gently in the test tube.
meanings.sent2: The metal had an oxygenous sheen to it.
meanings.sent3: The oxygenous paint seemed to glow in the dark.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as light and airy as an oxygenous melody.
meanings.sent5: The oxygenous taste of the water hinted at its purity.
